root.name: Asheron's Call 2: Fallen Kings
root.description: OverviewThe sequel to Asheron's Call; AC2 was shut down after only a few years. However, in December 2012, Turbine announced plans to re-open an Asheron's Call 2 server for paying subscribers of Asheron's Call.CharactersRacesHumansLugiansTumeroksFactionsDominionShadowOrderPlayers could align with one faction and take part in open-world PVP against the other two.PC System RequirementsWindows 98/ME/2000/XPPentium 733MHz Processor2GB Hard Disk Space32MB 3D Accelerated Video Card with Hardware TL56Kbps Modem

similar_games.game: The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
